EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Robert (1323963749.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Robert (1323963749.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Bob,
Thanks for the reply and update. I’ll be sure to send another email closer to March and we can discuss possibilities of working together then.
Regards,
Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: bob mikelskas [mailto:rmikelsk@gmail.com] Sent: Thursday, December 15, 2011 10:23 AM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners Robert
Steven: thanks for the note. I have been doing consulting for the past year and managing my own administrative tasks. I am busy through March and will probably be looking for new opportunities then.
Regards Bob On Wed, Dec 14, 2011 at 11:01 AM, Steven Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> wrote: Dear Robert,
It’s been some time since we last spoke with you, but I personally wanted to check in and share some news with you. We recently launched a new consultant-focused Web site which includes relevant tools such as a Bill Rate Calculator, a self-assessment tool on independence, and a video that shows how we help independents succeed in today’s project economy. We encourage you to take a look.
Whatever your work life stage, I also hope you can join me in celebrating the news that independent work life in America has arrived. Our company is well into a year-long effort called The State of Independence in America. I encourage you to view some very interesting findings on the size and trends for independent work in our nation.
Please feel free to reply to this email and provide an update on how your contract search is going. Are you working on a project now or you currently working W2 at the moment?
Steven Arhancet ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
